job_description: We are seeking a talented and experienced UX Designer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing and prototyping user interfaces that meet the needs of our customers and improve their user experience.
job_responsibilities: Conduct user research and usability testing
Collaborate with product and development teams
Maintain design systems and style guides
educational_requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Design or a related field
experience_required: 3+ years of professional experience in UX design, including experience with user research and usability testing.
